# FreeBSD Uptime Monitor - Project Instructions

This is an uptime monitoring web application similar to Uptime Kuma, built specifically with full FreeBSD support.

## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: Go (excellent FreeBSD compatibility)
- **Frontend**: SvelteKit (lightweight, builds on FreeBSD)
- **Database**: SQLite/PostgreSQL
- **Deployment**: FreeBSD native

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Go REST API server
- `/frontend` - SvelteKit web interface
- `/monitoring` - Core monitoring logic
- `/deploy` - FreeBSD deployment scripts

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize FreeBSD compatibility in all dependencies
- Use cross-platform Go libraries
- Follow FreeBSD service management patterns
- Implement comprehensive monitoring features
